data.title: Contact Us - Private Catholic School in Chicago
meta_keywords: Mother McAuley Liberal Arts High School
data.meta_description: Looking to contact us? Call our main office, admissions teams or counseling office for questions, or visit us at 3737 W. 99th St in Chicago.
data.text:
Main Office Phone Number

773-881-6500

To report a school absence, call 773-881-6518 or email attendance@mothermcauley.org

Address

Mother McAuley Liberal Arts High School

3737 W. 99th Street

Chicago, IL 60655

Directions

Mother McAuley Liberal Arts High School is located on 99th Street, three blocks east of Pulaski in an educational community. The school shares a campus with Saint Xavier University, Brother Rice High School and Evergreen Park Southwest Elementary School.

The conveniently located campus is accessible by foot and bicycle or via car, CTA, private bus service and PACE bus.
